reactor.io.net

Class AbstractNetPeer<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.io.net.AbstractNetPeer<IN,OUT>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatagramServer, TcpClient, TcpServer

    public abstract class AbstractNetPeer<IN,OUT>
extends Object
    Abstract base class that implements common functionality shared by clients and servers.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin, Stephane Maldini
